Description: Job Description:We are seeking a talented and experienced Google Ads Specialist to set up a call ads campaign for our website design services in the UK. As a Google Ads Specialist, you will be responsible for conducting keyword research, setting up the call ads campaign, optimizing it for maximum effectiveness, and ensuring cost efficiency. This is a remote position that offers flexible working hours.Responsibilities:* Conduct thorough keyword research to identify relevant and high-converting keywords related to website design in the UK market.* Set up a call ads campaign on the Google Ads platform to drive inbound calls from potential clients interested in website design services.* Ensure the campaign is optimized for maximum visibility and effectiveness, targeting the right audience and geographic locations.Requirements:* Proven work experience as a Google Ads Specialist or similar role, specifically in setting up and optimizing call ads campaigns.* Solid understanding of keyword research techniques and tools to identify relevant and high-converting keywords.* Proficiency in using the Google Ads platform, including campaign setup, optimization, and tracking.* Strong analytical skills to monitor campaign performance, analyze data, and make data-driven decisions for optimization.* Excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate with team members and stakeholders.Skills
